definition: to reply/to recover/to return (to a previous condition)/Re: in reply to (email)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: Agnes hasn't added or RSVPed to any events yet.
sentences.chinese: 尚未添加或回复任何事件。

sentences.english: This message contains a request to return a notification about your reception of the message.
sentences.chinese: 这封信要求回复信件处理通知给寄件者。

sentences.english: Concise, after receipt of the g frequently reply in turn good mood.
sentences.chinese: 简洁收到克勤的回复后，心情转好。

sentences.english: Enemies hit by meteors are knocked down, 25 second recharge.
sentences.chinese: 被陨石雨击中的敌人将倒地，25秒回复。

sentences.english: The answer to the girl's letter cost him much time.
sentences.chinese: 回复那姑娘的信使他花了许多时间。

sentences.english: I want to reply to the person's request .
sentences.chinese: 我想要回复那人的请求。

sentences.english: As difficult as it may be at times, try not to take negative feedback personally.
sentences.chinese: 回复时尽可能不牵动个人情绪，虽然有时候很难做到。

sentences.english: Seats are limited and will be available on first-reply-first-serve basis.
sentences.chinese: 座位有限及采用先回复先留位的方法。

sentences.english: For more information please check the appendix.
I have a batch of letters to answer.
In real prices, oil briefly fell back to pre-1973 levels.
sentences.chinese: 实际石油价格甚至短暂回复到1973年之前的水平。

sentences.english: Women are, in general, more capable of rapidly returning to orgasm immediately after an orgasmic experience.
sentences.chinese: 通常女性在高潮后可以更快的再次回复高潮。

sentences.english: PAN/PU hollow fibers possess excellent elastic recovery percentage.
sentences.chinese: PU具有较好的弹性回复率。

sentences.english: A daily conditioning shampoo to help protect hair, leaving it soft and manageable.
sentences.chinese: 能有效改善受损发质，令秀发回复柔顺。

sentences.english: The researchers measured how many responses they received by each type of postcard.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们分析了人们对于不同明信片的回复数量。

sentences.english: The aircraft's transponder replies with coded information to interrogation from the ground ATC station.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的应答机用代码信息来回复地面空管站的询问。

definition: private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)
to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
